original: Today, I will have to leave the office at 1pm.

original: You may open the window.

original: Quit acting like a baby.

original: When does the train depart?

original: Who told you that?

original: Open sewers are very common in Algeria.
translated: Des égouts à ciel ouvert sont très fréquents en Algérie.

original: "What do you think?" "Well, I'm for it."

original: Love is never wrong.
translated: L'amour ne se trompe jamais.

original: I don't like being blindsided.
translated: Je n'aime pas être pris de court.

original: If you don't trust them, they won't trust you.
translated: Si tu ne te fies pas à eux, ils ne se fieront pas à toi.

original: The big ship rammed a fishing boat.
translated: Le gros navire a percuté un bateau de pêche.

original: That bicycle belongs to our school.
translated: Ce vélo appartient à notre école.

original: We're behind schedule.

original: I learned something today, thanks to you.

original: Have you ever been to Okinawa?

original: What's your favorite Christmas carol?

original: Please let me know as soon as it's decided.

original: I slept all day yesterday, because it was Sunday.
translated: Hier j'ai dormi toute la journée car c'était dimanche.

original: The aircraft was conducting aerial reconnaissance.
translated: L'avion effectuait une reconnaissance aérienne.

original: Her father dedicated his life to science.

original: I'd like to be considered for the job.
translated: J'apprécierais que ma candidature pour le poste soit prise en considération.

original: The reasons of our failure are the following.

original: I'm not going to help you.

original: This one is free.

original: Is there anyone coming to help me?

original: Sometimes the rich hold the poor in contempt.
translated: Les riches méprisent parfois les pauvres.

original: "Listen to me," said the Demon, placing his hand upon my head.
translated: « Écoute-moi, » dit le Démon, en posant sa main sur ma tête.

original: That's the last thing you want.
translated: C'est la dernière chose que vous voulez.

original: He likes baseball very much.
translated: Il aime beaucoup le baseball.

original: All human beings have brains.
translated: Tous les êtres humains sont dotés de cerveaux.

original: Someone shouted his name.
translated: Quelqu'un a crié son nom.

original: If that's how matters stand, the next parliament will be uncontrollable.
translated: Si les choses en sont là, le prochain parlement sera incontrôlable.

original: Why would you say that?

original: What are you doing tonight?

original: She's always moaning about something.
translated: Elle se plaint toujours de quelque chose.

original: I didn't come here for that reason.

original: Tom never speaks French.

original: Yolks are yellow.
translated: Les jaunes d'œufs sont jaunes.

original: I'll meet him tomorrow.
translated: Je vais le rencontrer demain.

original: I want to apologize for the way I talked to you the last time we met.
translated: Je veux présenter mes excuses pour la manière dont je t'ai parlé la dernière fois que nous nous sommes rencontrés.

original: I'm a strong woman.

original: His house is on the other side of the bridge.
translated: Sa maison est de l'autre côté du pont.

original: Last night we barbecued beefsteak and vegetables.
translated: Hier soir, nous avons grillé des steak et des légumes sur le barbecue.

original: You always find something you're not looking for.
translated: On trouve toujours ce qu'on ne cherche pas.

original: The exhibition has drawn much attention from the public.
translated: L'exposition a grandement attiré l'attention du public.

original: He let go of the rope.
translated: Il lâcha la corde.

original: We can meet next week if you want.

original: We couldn't do that.

original: Tom shouldn't do that kind of thing.

original: I think it's time for me to lose some weight.

original: Tom seems to be hyperventilating.

original: There's not much room at my place.

original: So did you fall from the sky?

original: He took a day off.

original: We don't have too much time.

original: That's exactly it.

original: I can't see him either.

original: Paid maternity leave is a benefit available in almost all countries, except the United States.
translated: Le congé maternité est une indemnité disponible dans la plupart des pays, à l'exception des États-Unis d'Amérique.

original: He started crying as soon as he heard the news.
translated: Il a commencé à pleurer dès qu'il a entendu la nouvelle.

original: Sami wasn't listening to me.

original: This table is heavy.
translated: Cette table est lourde.

original: The poor talker sometimes surprises us by being a good writer.
translated: L'orateur malheureux nous surprend parfois en étant un bon écrivain.

original: After eight years of Bush the election of Obama was, for many, a breath of fresh air.
translated: Après huit ans de Bush, l'élection d'Obama était, pour beaucoup, une bouffée d'air frais.

original: Tom is on the honor roll.
translated: Tom est sur la liste des étudiants d'honneur.

original: Many young people are out of work in that country.
translated: Beaucoup de jeunes sont sans emploi dans ce pays.

original: Are you kidding?

original: No less than three hundred dollars was needed for the work.
translated: Pas moins de trois cents dollars furent nécessaires pour ce travail.

original: I can do better than this.
translated: Je peux faire mieux que ça.

original: The bus has just gone.
translated: Le bus vient de partir.

original: I cried like a baby.
translated: J'ai pleuré comme un bébé.

original: Tom is in his office at his desk.
translated: Tom est à son bureau dans son bureau.

original: I'm not sure I want the job.
translated: Je ne suis pas certaine de vouloir le poste.

original: I drive a hybrid.
translated: Je conduis un véhicule hybride.

original: I'm growing a beard again.

original: Stay alert.

original: He laid himself flat on the floor.
translated: Il s'est allongé sur le plancher.

original: This isn't the right way to do this.
translated: Ce n'est pas la bonne manière de réaliser ceci.

original: He is not in.

original: Don't fuck it up!

original: I lit the match.
translated: Je craquai l'allumette.

original: I've got a pair of sunglasses.
translated: J'ai une paire de lunettes de soleil.

original: He stuck the book in his bag.
translated: Il fourra le livre dans son sac.

original: You look a little green.
translated: Tu n'as pas l'air dans ton assiette.

original: How is this relevant?

original: That accident happened near his house.
translated: Cet accident est survenu près de chez lui.

original: Your friendship is most precious to me.
translated: Votre amitié m'est très précieuse.

original: Tom took a selfie while flexing his muscles.
translated: Tom a pris un selfie tout en contractant ses muscles.

original: I planted a tree.
translated: J'ai planté un arbre.

original: I'm wasting my time.
translated: Je perds mon temps.

original: Your plan didn't work.
translated: Votre projet n'a pas fonctionné.

original: A good memory is his weapon.
translated: Son arme, c'est une bonne mémoire.

original: Give me your address.
translated: Donne-moi ton adresse !

original: You have to try!

original: If you want, you can easily make it.
translated: Si tu veux, tu peux le faire aisément.

original: Have you ever been to Tokyo?
translated: Êtes-vous déjà allé à Tokyo ?

original: Dad's in an impatient mood today.
translated: Papa est impatient aujourd'hui.

original: What's new with you? How is your new job working out?
translated: Quoi de neuf ? Comment se passe ton nouvel emploi ?

original: The plumber used many tools to fix our sink.
translated: Le plombier a utilisé de nombreux outils pour réparer notre évier.

original: Why did you call?
translated: Pourquoi vous avez appelé ?

original: You can't say I didn't try.
translated: Tu ne peux pas dire que je n'ai pas essayé.

original: What do you regret most?
translated: Qu'est-ce que vous regrettez le plus ?

original: She owes him a lot of money.
translated: Elle lui doit beaucoup d'argent.

original: It will become much warmer in March.
translated: Il fera bien plus chaud en mars.

original: The coach gave me some advice.
translated: L'entraîneur m'a donné des conseils.

original: I sincerely feel sorry for you.
translated: Je suis sincèrement désolé pour vous.

original: How are you doing?
translated: Comment allez-vous ?

original: Even though Tom and Marie are twins, they don't look very much alike.
translated: Bien que Tom et Marie soient jumeaux, ils ne se ressemblent pas beaucoup.

original: We saw an old hut standing at the margin of the forest.
translated: Nous vîmes une vieille cabane en bordure de forêt.

original: I am afraid that he might get hurt.
translated: J'ai peur qu'il se blesse.

original: I never want to leave you again.
translated: Je ne veux plus jamais te quitter.

original: I don't know Tom.
translated: Je ne connais pas Tom.

original: You want to leave it like that?
translated: Veux-tu le laisser ainsi ?

original: Go for it!
translated: Fonce !

original: You didn't seem to enjoy the concert very much.
translated: Vous ne semblez pas avoir très apprécié le concert.

original: I used to keep a diary.
translated: J'avais l'habitude de tenir un journal.

original: How many books do you have in your bag?
translated: Combien de livres as-tu dans ton sac ?

original: Will you entertain the guests while I get dressed?
translated: Veux-tu bien aller t'occuper des invités pendant que je m'habille ?

original: They're speaking French.
translated: Elles parlent en français.

original: He's a dishonest salesperson.
translated: C'est un vendeur malhonnête.

original: I went to Disneyland yesterday.
translated: Je me suis rendu à Disneyland hier.

original: Why didn't you tell me about this?
translated: Pourquoi ne m'en as-tu pas parlé ?

original: My brother is big enough to travel alone.
translated: Mon frère est assez grand pour voyager seul.

original: Have they spotted you?
translated: T'ont-elles repéré ?

original: We estimate that there are several fossils in these giant rocks.
translated: On estime qu'il y a plusieurs fossiles dans ces roches géantes.

original: What are we supposed to do?
translated: Que sommes-nous supposés faire ?

original: I plan to pursue a career in international finance.
translated: J'envisage de faire carrière dans la finance internationale.

original: For me, the real world is just a fiction.
translated: Tout le réel pour moi n'est qu'une fiction.

original: What is there to be afraid of?
translated: Qu'y a-t-il là d'effrayant ?

original: I can't go with you tonight.
translated: Je ne peux aller avec vous, ce soir.

original: I'm feeling stressed.
translated: Je me sens stressée.

original: They bought a house in Connemara last year.
translated: L'année dernière, ils ont acheté une maison dans le Connemara.

original: Escape!
translated: Échappe-toi !

original: Can you please help me for just a minute?
translated: Peux-tu m'aider juste une minute, s'il te plaît ?

original: I think that Tom bought the house that he was looking at last week.
translated: Je crois que Tom a acheté la maison qu’il a regardée la semaine dernière.

original: Whose friend is he?
translated: De qui est-il l'ami ?

original: Did anyone see you there?
translated: Quiconque vous y a-t-il vu ?

original: We all want changes.
translated: Nous voulons tous des changements.

original: In what country were you born?
translated: Dans quel pays êtes-vous né ?

original: I'll go crazy if this keeps up.
translated: Je deviendrai fou si ça continue.

original: I'm going to be in Boston next weekend.
translated: Je vais être à Boston le week-end prochain.

original: Tom visited four countries.
translated: Tom a visité quatre pays.

original: Let's stop and rest.
translated: Arrêtons-nous pour nous reposer.

original: I knew there was something fishy about that guy.
translated: Je savais que ce type avait quelque chose de louche.

original: They used that table.
translated: Ils ont utilisé cette table.

original: The piano has a good tone.
translated: Le piano a un bon timbre.

original: We're going out to celebrate.
translated: Nous sortons pour célébrer.

original: We didn't have much fun.
translated: On ne s'est pas bien amusé.

original: My car is now being repaired.
translated: Ma voiture est actuellement en réparation.

original: I don't have anything to hide.
translated: Je n'ai rien à cacher.

original: The criticism was trenchant but fair.
translated: La critique fut incisive mais juste.

original: I have a bruise.
translated: J'ai un bleu.

original: I went to the bank to take out money.
translated: Je suis allé à la banque pour prendre de l'argent.

original: Life is like a soap bubble.
translated: La vie est pareille à une bulle de savon.

original: You never can tell what you might find at that store.
translated: On ne peut jamais dire ce qu'on pourrait trouver dans ce magasin.

original: People have no money.
translated: Les gens n'ont pas d'argent.

original: This is unsatisfactory.
translated: Ce n'est pas satisfaisant.

original: Does it bother you if I light up a cigarette?
translated: Ça te dérange si j'allume une cigarette ?

original: The road dips suddenly.
translated: La route descend soudainement.

original: He retires next spring.
translated: Il prend sa retraite au printemps prochain.

original: She was busy with household work.
translated: Elle était occupée aux tâches ménagères.

original: I wasn't really in the mood.
translated: Je n'étais pas vraiment d'humeur.

original: I'm the one who asked you the question.
translated: C'est moi qui vous ai posé la question.

original: Do not make noise, please.
translated: Ne faites pas de bruit, s'il vous plait.

original: If you ever need a job, come see me.
translated: Si jamais tu as besoin d'un boulot, viens me voir !

original: Hello, what's your name?
translated: Salut, comment tu t'appelles ?

original: You should do something with your hair.
translated: Tu devrais faire quelque chose à tes cheveux !

original: I think we should leave now.
translated: Je pense que nous devrions partir maintenant.

original: Take notes.
translated: Prenez des notes.

original: The skin of animals is covered with hair.
translated: La peau des animaux est couverte de poils.

original: Do you fancy going for a bike ride?
translated: Avez-vous envie de partir en balade à vélo ?

original: She is too strong.
translated: Elle est très forte.

original: They can't fire you.
translated: Ils ne peuvent pas te virer.

original: Grab that.
translated: Attrape ça !

original: Do you want to go to the cinema or the theater?
translated: Vous voulez aller au cinéma ou au théâtre ?

original: Hug me tight.
translated: Serrez-moi bien fort.

original: Virtues should be sisters, the same way vices are brothers.
translated: Les vertus devraient être sœurs ainsi que les vices sont frères.

original: I'm afraid you have the wrong number.
translated: Je crains que vous n'ayez le mauvais numéro.

original: How about going for a drive?
translated: Si on allait se faire une virée en voiture ?

original: Somehow I believe you.
translated: Quelque part je te crois.

original: Where's the Red Cross?
translated: Où est la Croix Rouge ?

original: I have not heard from you. I was wondering if maybe my mail never got to you.
translated: Je n'ai pas eu de tes nouvelles. Je me demandais si peut-être mon courrier électronique ne t'était jamais parvenu.

original: Let me be the judge of that.
translated: Laisse-moi en être juge.

original: At first, I had difficulty understanding people when they spoke too fast.
translated: Au début, j'avais des difficultés à comprendre les gens qui parlaient trop vite.

original: I ate something that didn't agree with me.
translated: J'ai mangé quelque chose qui ne passe pas.

original: I have never eaten horse meat.
translated: Je n’ai jamais mangé de la viande de cheval.

original: You don't kick a man when he's down.
translated: On ne frappe pas un homme à terre.

original: Can you make it go any faster?
translated: Peux-tu le faire aller plus vite ?

original: Hello, Meg, how have you been?
translated: Salut, Meg, comment ça va ?

original: She took off her clothes.
translated: Elle a ôté ses vêtements.

original: I didn't have the sense to do so.
translated: Je n'eus pas le bon sens de le faire.

original: I saw fear in her eyes.
translated: J'ai vu de la peur dans ses yeux.

original: I remember everything you tell me.
translated: Je me rappelle tout ce que vous me dites.

original: I'm going to live alone.
translated: Je vais vivre seule.

original: Thanking you in anticipation.
translated: En vous remerciant par avance.

original: It was all a dream.
translated: Ce n'était qu'un rêve.

original: She fell in love with a certain prince.
translated: Elle est tombée amoureuse d'un certain prince.

original: Tom stole the show.
translated: Tom a volé la vedette.

original: He offered ten dollars for our old radio.
translated: Il nous offrit dix dollars en échange de notre vieille radio.

original: We hold these truths to be self-evident, that all men are created equal . . .
translated: Nous tenons pour vérités manifestes, que tous les hommes sont créés égaux...

original: I met a nice woman.
translated: J'ai fait la connaissance d'une femme agréable.

original: Could I have a word with you in private?
translated: Pourrais-je avoir un mot avec vous en privé ?

original: I'll see what I can do, but I promise you nothing.
translated: Je verrai ce que je peux faire, mais je ne vous promets rien.

original: You'll have to drive.
translated: Tu devras conduire.

original: It burned.
translated: Ça a brûlé.

original: This is all so strange.
translated: Tout est si étrange.

original: I was running.
translated: Je courais.

original: I swear I'll shoot you.
translated: Je te jure, je vais te tirer dessus.

original: I went out with the heater on.
translated: Je suis sorti dehors en laissant le chauffage allumé.

original: Three people have been arrested.
translated: Trois personnes ont été arrêtées.

original: She gave a shrug of the shoulders.
translated: Elle haussa des épaules.

original: Sami rented a hotel room.
translated: Sami a loué une chambre d'hôtel.

original: Will you leave tomorrow?
translated: Allez-vous partir demain ?

original: The more chocolate you eat, the fatter you'll get.
translated: Plus tu manges de chocolat, plus gros tu deviens.

original: I'm hungry. How about you?
translated: J'ai faim. Et toi ?

original: They're safe.
translated: Ils vont bien.

original: I'm in a good mood today.
translated: Je suis de bonne humeur aujourd'hui.

original: It's always toxic.
translated: C'est toujours toxique.

original: These logs are heavy.
translated: Ces bûches sont lourdes.

original: She couldn't convince him to ride a horse.
translated: Elle ne put le convaincre de monter à cheval.

original: We walk among the lemon trees.
translated: Au travers des citronniers, nous marchons.

original: I didn't tell Tom I knew his brother.
translated: Je n'ai pas dit à Tom que je connaissais son frère.

original: Tom was not far behind.
translated: Tom n'était pas loin derrière.

original: Do you really enjoy doing that kind of thing?
translated: Apprécies-tu vraiment ce genre de choses ?

original: Why do you want to buy this book?
translated: Pourquoi voulez-vous acheter ce livre ?

original: We've got to hurry.
translated: Il faut que nous nous dépêchions.

original: Would you like to see the plans?
translated: Aimerais-tu voir les plans ?

original: Give it to them.
translated: Donne-la-leur.

original: It took about 15 minutes.
translated: Ça a pris environ 15 minutes.

original: Our sister bought some eggplants, potatoes, zucchinis and Chinese cabbage at the market.
translated: Notre sœur a acheté quelques aubergines, des pommes de terre, des courgettes et du chou chinois au marché.

original: It depends on how much money you have.
translated: Ça dépend de combien d'argent vous disposez.

original: Tom wasn't at Mary's funeral.
translated: Tom n'était pas à l'enterrement de Mary.

original: The classroom is clean.
translated: La salle de classe est propre.

original: Be careful not to hurt yourself.
translated: Faites attention à ne pas vous faire de mal !

original: I figured something was up.
translated: J'ai songé que quelque chose se tramait.

original: I don't have a cellphone.
translated: Je n'ai pas de téléphone cellulaire.

original: Where should I put my bags?
translated: Où devrais-je poser mes sacs ?

original: Are you saying that my life is in danger?
translated: Es-tu en train de dire que ma vie est en danger ?

original: I'll need to factor that in.
translated: Je devrai prendre cela en compte.

original: May the way of the hero lead to the Triforce.
translated: Puisse son chemin mener le héros à la Triforce.

original: Let me paint you a picture.
translated: Laissez-moi vous dresser un tableau !

original: He is nothing but a fool.
translated: Il est tout sauf idiot.

original: My room is always neat.
translated: Ma chambre est toujours bien rangée.

original: This is the unforgettable place where we met each other for the first time.
translated: C'est le lieu inoubliable où nous nous sommes rencontrés pour la première fois.

original: Did you get a Christmas present for Tom this year?
translated: As-tu acheté un cadeau de Noël pour Tom cette année ?

original: I love him anyway.
translated: Toutefois, je l'aime.

original: If you wouldn't mind, I could use a hand.
translated: Si ça ne te dérange pas, j'aurais besoin d'un coup de main.

original: Please come here between two and three this afternoon.
translated: Venez ici entre deux heures et trois heures cette après-midi.

original: What are you two conspiring about?
translated: Qu'êtes-vous en train de manigancer ?

original: The house has icicles on it.
translated: Il y des glaçons sur la maison.

original: This letter is for you.
translated: Cette lettre est pour vous.

original: Did you see a good film last time?
translated: Avez-vous vu un bon film la dernière fois?

original: I had no intention of going there by myself.
translated: Je n'avais aucune intention de m'y rendre par mes propres moyens.

original: Tom screamed loudly.
translated: Tom a crié très fort.

original: Wait!
translated: Attendez !

original: Do you speak Marathi?
translated: Parles-tu marathi ?

original: He stopped drinking.
translated: Il a arrêté de boire.

original: We'll discuss it later.
translated: Nous en parlerons plus tard.

original: We saw him walking across the street.
translated: Nous l'avons vu traverser la rue.

original: I'm starting to feel better already.
translated: Je commence à me sentir déjà mieux.

original: He spoke under his breath.
translated: Il parlait en chuchotant.

original: Where were you hiding?
translated: Où vous cachiez-vous ?

original: Tom and François try to acquire French citizenship.
translated: Tom et François essaient d'acquérir la nationalité française.

original: You can avoid foodborne illness by having separate cutting boards for meat and vegetables.
translated: On peut éviter des maladies alimentaires en ayant deux planches à découper, pour la viande et pour les légumes.

original: How much does a beer cost?
translated: Combien coûte une bière ?

original: They're clean.
translated: Ils sont propres.

original: I'll have to do that by myself.
translated: Je vais devoir le faire moi-même.

original: There was revelry at Tom's house.
translated: Il y eut des réjouissances chez Tom.

original: True love is like the appearance of ghosts: everyone talks about it but few have seen it.
translated: Il en est du véritable amour comme de l’apparition des esprits : tout le monde en parle, mais peu de gens en ont vu.

original: It is easy to be brave from a safe distance.
translated: Il est facile d'être courageux avec une distance de sécurité.

original: It's going to be morning soon.
translated: Ça va bientôt être le matin.

original: It smelt of smoke.
translated: Ça sentait la fumée.

original: After spring comes summer.
translated: Après le printemps, arrive l'été.

original: Nice costume.
translated: Beau costume.

original: I got to the bus stop just after the bus had left.
translated: Je suis arrivé à l'arrêt de bus juste après qu'il soit parti.

original: My mom gave me RM100 to buy necessities.
translated: Ma mère m'a donné RM100 pour faire les courses.

original: Both dogs are asleep.
translated: Les deux chiens sont endormis.

original: She advised him to fasten his seat belt.
translated: Elle lui conseilla de mettre sa ceinture.

original: Our budget won't allow that luxury.
translated: Notre budget ne permettra pas ce luxe.

translated: Ann écrivit quelque chose au tableau.

original: Right now your actions do not match your words.
translated: En ce moment, tes actions ne correspondent pas à tes paroles.

original: That's all I needed.
translated: C'est tout ce dont j'avais besoin.

original: I heard the news on the radio.
translated: J'ai entendu les nouvelles à la radio.

original: A solution to this problem is still some way off.
translated: Une solution à ce problème est encore à distance.

original: Thanks for your help.
translated: Merci pour votre aide.

original: He wept over his misfortunes.
translated: Il a pleuré de ses malheurs.

original: You must see it to believe it.
translated: Il vous faut le voir pour le croire.

original: Today's show is a rerun.
translated: Le programme d'aujourd'hui est une rediffusion.

original: Do you always see your friends in this café?
translated: Voyez-vous toujours vos amis dans ce café ?

original: With a good book in your hands you need never feel lonely.
translated: Avec un bon livre entre les mains, on ne se sent jamais seul.

original: I don't care what you think of me.
translated: Je me fiche de ce que vous pensez de moi.

original: She asked them to take their shoes off.
translated: Elle leur demanda de retirer leurs chaussures.

original: He took care of the baby.
translated: Il s'est occupé du bébé.

original: That's something we'll improve on.
translated: C'est quelque chose que nous améliorerons.

original: There is a little wine left in the bottom of the glass.
translated: Il reste un peu de vin au fond du verre.

original: I'm sort of an extrovert.
translated: Je suis en quelque sorte extraverti.

original: Here is the tablet.
translated: Voici la tablette.

original: Did you bring what I asked?
translated: As-tu apporté ce que j'ai demandé ?

original: I see Dan and Andrei.
translated: Je vois Dan et Andrei.

original: Skura returned home and Yanni agreed to take her back.
translated: Skura est rentrée et Yanni a accepté de la raccompagner.

original: I'm not ready for a change yet.
translated: Je ne suis pas encore prête pour un changement.

original: What'll we do if Tom is late?
translated: Que ferons-nous si Tom est en retard ?

original: He will never forgive my debt.
translated: Il ne va jamais oublier mes dettes.

original: She kept him waiting for a long time.
translated: Elle le fit attendre longtemps.

original: She has a good command of English though she was brought up in Japan.
translated: Elle a une bonne maîtrise de l'anglais bien qu'élevée au Japon.

original: She hung the calendar on the wall.
translated: Elle a accroché le calendrier au mur.

original: I've never talked about it.
translated: Je n'en ai jamais parlé.

original: I'm not your teacher.
translated: Je ne suis pas ton professeur.

original: I've never trusted her and I never will.
translated: Je ne lui ai jamais fait confiance et je ne le ferai jamais.

original: She's on a roll.
translated: Elle est dans une bonne passe.

original: She was the one who suggested it.
translated: C'est elle qui l'a suggéré.

original: I didn't want you involved in this.
translated: Je ne voulais pas que tu sois mêlé à ça.

original: Yes, a little.
translated: Oui, un peu.

original: The lovers exchanged numerous letters.
translated: Les amants ont échangé de nombreuses lettres.

original: He was a bit jealous.
translated: Il était un peu jaloux.

original: I was eating your cake.
translated: Je mangeai votre gâteau.

original: I only need a minute.
translated: Il ne me faut qu'une minute.

original: She was dressed all in white for the wedding.
translated: Elle était vêtue tout de blanc pour la noce.

original: It was too bad you couldn't come.
translated: C'était dommage que tu ne pouvais pas venir.

original: Tom has three cats.
translated: Tom a trois chats.

original: See you on Monday.
translated: On se voit lundi.

original: Marie is probably rich.
translated: Marie est probablement riche.

original: I would like a less expensive double room.
translated: Je voudrais une chambre double moins chère.

original: She doesn't know how to ride a bike.
translated: Elle ne sait pas faire de la bicyclette.

original: This is my friend Rachel. We went to school together.
translated: C'est mon amie Rachel. On est allé à l'école ensemble.

original: Tom seems to be objective.
translated: Tom semble être objectif.

original: Speak French, OK?
translated: Parlons français, d'accord ?

original: That's not our problem now.
translated: Ce n'est plus notre problème.

original: I turned on the TV.
translated: J'ai allumé la télé.

original: Why is Yiddish so similar to German?
translated: Pourquoi est-ce que le yiddish est si proche de l'allemand ?

original: My wife keeps the household accounts.
translated: Ma femme tient les comptes de la maison.

original: This dish is terrific.
translated: Ce plat est sensationnel.

original: He left school when he was in high school.
translated: Il a quitté l'école quand il était au lycée.

original: He goes to school by bus.
translated: Il va à l'école en bus.

original: We'll have to see what's doable.
translated: Nous devrons voir ce qui est faisable.

original: I'm afraid of heights.
translated: J'ai le vertige.

original: From the look of the sky I'm afraid the rain won't let up for a while.
translated: Vu l'apparence du ciel, j'ai bien peur que la pluie ne s'arrête pas de sitôt.

original: OK, you win.
translated: Ok, vous avez gagné.

original: Why did you invite me?
translated: Pourquoi m'avez-vous invité ?

original: They were all good swimmers.
translated: Elles étaient toutes de bonnes nageuses.

original: There are big stones on the ground.
translated: Il y a de grosses pierres sur le sol.

original: Did you carry out your plan?
translated: Avez-vous réalisé votre plan ?

original: We spent the day in the open air.
translated: Nous avons passé la journée au grand air.

original: Did you push the button?
translated: Avez-vous appuyé sur le bouton ?

original: The flowers don't look well. I'd like to water them. Is there a watering can?
translated: Les fleurs n'ont pas l'air bien. Je voudrais les arroser. Est-ce qu'il y a un arrosoir ?

original: I like English best of all subjects.
translated: De toutes les matières, je préfère l'anglais.

original: I let you catch me.
translated: Je t'ai laissée m'attraper.

original: Humor them.
translated: Faites leur plaisir.

original: It's not cheap to eat here.
translated: Manger ici n'est pas bon marché.

original: How did the railway accident at Tokyo Station happen?
translated: Comment l'accident de chemin de fer à la gare de Tokyo est-il arrivé ?

original: All the answers are correct.
translated: Toutes les réponses sont justes.

original: The property was divided equally among the heirs.
translated: Les biens furent repartis équitablement entre les héritiers.

original: I didn't steal it. I just borrowed it.
translated: Je ne l'ai pas volé. Je l'ai juste emprunté.

original: He seems honest enough.
translated: Il semble assez honnête.
